course_description: Students will learn the etiology, epidemiology, prevention, and treatment of HIV disease from local, national, and global perspectives. This course builds the necessary competencies in care of individuals affected by HIV/AIDS.
sections: Class Nbr: 4793, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 4:30-6:20p, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Open
